comments: Unsigned sequence satisfies a(n)=na(n-1)+b(n-1) where b(n) is defined in A009006. E.g.f. tanh(z)/(1-z). - Mario Catalani (mario.catalani(AT)unito.it), Feb 10 2003
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
maple: G(x):= tanh(x)/(1+x): f[0]:=G(x): for n from 1 to 21 do f[n]:=diff(f[n-1],x) od: x:=0: seq(f[n],n=0..20); # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Apr 03 2009
author: _R. H. Hardin_
